comments: Number of permutations satisfying -k<=p(i)-i<=r and p(i)-i not in I, i=1..n, with k=1, r=3, I={0,1}. - _Vladimir Baltic_, Mar 07 2012Number of compositions (ordered partitions) of n into parts 3 and 4.
